actions.name: Infiltrator
actions.description: Effect: The user's [Contact] attacks ignore [Shield] effects when attacking a creature in range, and cannot be Interrupted by other creatures' Actions. Attacks against creatures with an active [Shield] effect deal +20% more damage.

system.description: The user's [Contact] attacks ignore [Shield] effects when attacking a creature in range, and cannot be Interrupted by other creatures' Actions. Attacks against creatures with an active [Shield] effect deal +20% more damage
